title: Operating income of the Walt Disney Company 2010 - 2019 , by region
summary: In 2019 , the Walt Disney Company Company generated a total Operating of eight billion U.S. dollars in Europe , but the Walt Disney Company 's largest Region was the United_States_and_Canada and , which generated Operating of over 50.5 billion U.S. dollars in that year .
The Walt Disney Company 's total Operating in 2018 amounted to 69.57 billion U.S. dollars .
Walt Disney Company Company - additional information The Walt Disney Company Company was founded in 1923 2019 brothers Walt Disney Company and Roy O. Walt Disney Company .
gold: The Walt Disney Company 's worldwide operating income amounted to 14.86 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 , of which 2.43 billion U.S. dollars were derived from operations in Europe.
Operating income from Latin America and other areas came to 237 million U.S. dollars that year .
